    Interstroke stratified analysis for predictor

    is_figure_stratified_subgroups.Rd

    Interstroke stratified analysis for predictor

    Usage

    is_figure_stratified_subgroups(
  interstroke_data,
  subgroups,
  model,
  limits = NULL,
  p_sig = NULL,
  breaks = NULL,
  text_size = NULL,
  drop_columns = NULL,
  include_overall = TRUE,
  long_title = TRUE,
  regression_type = NULL
)

    Arguments

    interstroke_data

    Project specific Interstroke dataset.

    subgroups

    A list of subgroups for stratified analysis.

    model

    Model formula for analysis. Predictor should be first independant variable.

    limits

    **Optional** Limit the x axis in the format c(xmin, xmax).

    p_sig

    **Optional** Set the level of significance to hide non significant values. Default displays all p values <1.

    breaks

    **Optional** Set the sequence for breaks in the format seq(xmin, xmax, interval)

    text_size

    **Optional** Assign value for text size.

    drop_columns

    **Optional** Drop population and subgroup columns suitable for joint plots.

    long_title

    **Optional** Set to false to just display predictor as title

    regression_type

    either "unconditional" or "conditional". Conditional models require +strata(caseid) at end of model formula.

    Value

    A dataframe suitable for Interstroke forest ggplot function.

    Examples

    On this page
